name: SHARKS
summary:
🦈🦈  THE FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY UPDATE🦈🦈
Collect hidden treasures and send them up for a reward: will you work together, or make it every shark for themselves?

✅ You're a shark
✅ Hang out with friends
✅ Proximity voice chat
✅ Public and Private lobbies/rooms
✅ 100's of cosmetics to express your true shark

🦈 You're a shark: use your mouth to bite, grab, carry, place, build and attack in this multiplayer physics sandbox game.
